FuncDef: To add a reference to the system default class that does not match any traffic class, use the class class-default command. To remove the system default class from the policy map, use the no form of this command.
ParentView: control plane policy map configuration mode
qos policy map in switch profile configuration mode
ParaDef: This command has no arguments or keywords.
ExtraInfo:
Traffic that fails to match any class is assigned to a default class of traffic called class-default. You cannot delete this class.
Command Default:None
